Author: notasskinnyuwu
Text: Yea. It was relevant although I didn’t post details in the previous post  We have 2 kids and I couldn’t make it past 36 weeks w them, prob bc I was tiny/ underweight. We saw pics of her close to due date and she was huge. He was saying how she wouldn’t go full term bc she was small too. Then was saying how big she was and how noticeable it was bc she was so skinny before.   He thought it was a compliment saying she was skinnier than me before bc he thought she was WAY too skinny, “scary skinny” and thought she looked sick so he thought he was saying something nice

Author: SpaceWhale88
Text: Sorry I stalked you. So this is the same guy who goes around pointing out thinner women?
